appetizer.name: Lumpiang Shanghai
appetizer.description: Heaping pyramid of spring rolls filled with ground por, carrots, Chinese celery, and flavored with our secret spice blend. Comes with a sweet chili sauce.

appetizer.name: Tokwa't Baboy
appetizer.description: Tofu and pork deep fried together and served with a sweet and sour soy mix.

appetizer.name: Pritong Kangkong
appetizer.description: Water spinach leaves dried and fried in an airy pancake batter.

appetizer.name: Calamares
appetizer.description: Squid rings coated in batter and deep fried. Served with a sweet and spicy chili pepper vinaigrette.

appetizer.name: Kamote Fries
appetizer.description: Filipino sweet potato cut into wedges and glazed with caramel.

entree.name: Adobong Baboy
entree.description: For sharing. Succulent pork shoulder chopped and marinated in our in-house 'red adobo' mix. Flavorful and just the right amount of oiliness.

entree.name: Adobong Manok
entree.description: For sharing. A whole chicken chopped, marinaded in our in-house 'red adobo' mix and grilled to perfection.

entree.name: Adobong Talong
entree.description: Because we didn't want our vegetarian diners to miss out on our red adobo mix. Flame-roasted marinaded eggplant served with sliced mushrooms.

dessert.name: Turon
dessert.description: Bananas and caramelized jackfruit wrapped in a thin sheet of wheat, served with a caramel glaze and garnished with sesame seeds.

dessert.name: Halo-halo
dessert.description: A wonderful combination of various traditional Filipino sweets including ube, leche flan, and candied beans served on a bed of ice
